description:
We have such a beautiful and exquisite House that we have moved out of the lounge and dinning room to show more of it. We venture down to our billiards room at the end of the hall, bring in a pianist, and invite our guests to indulge in all of the debauchery that we love to see them do.
Our slaves do us proud by making sure everyone is served properly, whether it be basic service or making sure our Steward is completely satisfied with their blowjob skills. The night ends with the slaves being let loose on one of our guest to show her how we celebrate birthdays here on TUF.
title: Piano Party-Exploring TUF
